com.smaato.soma

Class VideoBannerView

  • java.lang.Object
    • RelativeLayout
      • com.smaato.soma.BaseView
        • com.smaato.soma.BannerView
          • com.smaato.soma.VideoBannerView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BaseViewInterface

    public class VideoBannerView
extends BannerView
    Represents a soma video view that can be added to your layouts. Is derived form SOMABanner and sets the mediaType fixed to MediaType.VIDEO.
    2011 Smaato, Inc. All Rights Reserved. Use of this software is subject to the Smaato Terms of Service.
